title: Barani Barani Lyrics Pudhu Nellu Pudhu Naathu
stanzas:
Barani Barani Song Lyrics From Pudhu Nellu Pudhu Naathu
Singer / Music: Ilaiyaraaja

Anbu neera paachu
Idhu arumaiyaana thottam.
Azhugai polappum pochu
Ini anugidaadhu vaattam

Siriya kuruvi pottadhu
Oru poondhottame.
Siruga siruga nadathudhu
Nalla thaerottame.
category: OldSong:Barani Barani - Pudhu Nellu Pudhu Naathu
